doc.str: A method for recovering zinc ions by selective zinc sulfide precipitation from an aqueous solution comprising zinc ions and metal ions of a metal that precipitates as a metal sulfide at a pH lower than a pH at which zinc ions precipitate as a zinc sulfide.

"Hydroxide Precipitation", Hoffland Environmental Inc., Internet, Nov. 21, 2007, 3 pages, <http://www.hoffland.net/src/tks/3.xml>. cited by other . | Ayres, D. et al., "Removing Heavy Metals from Wastewater", Engineering Research Center Report, University of Maryland, pp. 1-21, Aug. 1994. cited by other . | Fathi Habashi, Hydrolytic and Ionic Precipitation, A Textbook of Hydrometallurgy, Metallurgie Extractive Quebec (1999), p. 624-625. cited by examiner . | "Precipitation--General Discussion and Theory", Engineering Manual, pp. 1-7, vol.
